Actions.Name: Returns a list of articles based on keyword search
Actions.Description: Search for NYT articles by keywords.

Actions.Name: Returns a list of most viewed articles on NYTimes.com by time period
Actions.Description: Returns an array of the most viewed articles on NYTimes.com for specified period of time (1 day, 7 days, or 30 days).

Actions.Name: Returns a list of top stories by section
Actions.Description: The Top Stories service returns an array of articles currently on the specified section.
